name: New-York-Burrito
location: Link Square Mall, Bandra West, Mumbai.
address: Opposite Hawaiian shack, Shop no. 1, Kalpitam Apartments, 16th Rd, Pali village, Link Square Mall, Mumbai, Mumbai
description: New York Burrito Company is a F&B-Casual Dining Indian outlet that offers a wide variety of delicious and authentic Indian dishes. The restaurant has a cozy and inviting atmosphere, and the staff is friendly and attentive. The menu features a variety of vegetarian and non-vegetarian dishes, as well as a selection of desserts. The restaurant also offers catering services for special occasions. The food is freshly prepared and the prices are reasonable. The restaurant is a great place to enjoy a delicious meal with friends and family.
